thread.title: Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy

author: newsr.in
title: Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy
text: Hillary Rodham Clinton and Sen. Bernie Sanders clashed over U.S. involvement in the Middle East, gun control and economic policy in the first Democratic presidential debate Tuesday night, vigorously outlining competing visions for a party seeking to keep the White House for a third straight term.
